text: Nancy Maryanne Dow (July 22, 1936 - May 25, 2016) was an American actress and model. She appeared in a brief group of movies and television shows such as The Beverly Hillbillies, The Wild Wild West and the 2005 movie Pure. She was married to Greek American actor John Aniston with whom she had a daughter, actress Jennifer Aniston (born February 11, 1969). Dow died at a hospital in Los Angeles, California on May 25, 2016 from complications from a stroke, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Nancy Dow
